lead_paragraph: Buster Posey drove in a pair of runs, Jake Peavy pitched five scoreless innings and the San Francisco Giants beat the Oakland Athletics 3-0 on Friday night.

headline.print_headline: Posey Plates 2, Peavy Goes 5 Scoreless and Giants Beat A's
headline.main: Posey Plates 2, Peavy Goes 5 Scoreless and Giants Beat A's

snippet: Buster Posey drove in a pair of runs, Jake Peavy pitched five scoreless innings and the San Francisco Giants beat the Oakland Athletics 3-0 on Friday night....
